WITH epoch AS (
  SELECT MAX(epoch) as max_epoch FROM babylon_checkpoint_${chain_id}
)
 select
  idx.height,
  idx.status,
  vi.moniker AS moniker,
  idx.epoch
FROM
  babylon_checkpoint_${chain_id} idx
JOIN
  meta.validator_info vi
  ON idx.validator_hex_address_id = vi.id
JOIN
  epoch
  ON idx.epoch BETWEEN (epoch.max_epoch - 50) AND epoch.max_epoch
ORDER by
  idx.height DESC

;  -- Order in ascending order for the last 100 blocks
WITH max_height AS (
  SELECT MAX(height) AS highest_height
  FROM voteindexer_${chain_id}
)
SELECT
  vidx.height,
  vidx.status,
  vi.moniker AS moniker
FROM
  voteindexer_${chain_id} vidx
JOIN
  meta.validator_info vi
  ON vidx.validator_hex_address_id = vi.id
JOIN
  max_height mh  -- Join to get the maximum block height
  ON vidx.height BETWEEN (mh.highest_height - 100) AND mh.highest_height
ORDER by
  vidx.height ASC
